Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted with exceptional quality. This product is not just an item; it's an experience that promises to exceed your expectations. Considering its craftsmanship and unique features, we believe it's worth more than its face value. I'm extending this opportunity to you at a special introductory price of $75. Don't miss out on this chance to own something truly special. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $75. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $75
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $120
